name: Study to Activity Dev
postCreateCommand: pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install
postStartCommand: if [ -d "$HOME/.antigravity-server/bin" ]; then cd "$HOME/.antigravity-server/bin" && for dir in *-*; do hash=$(echo "$dir" | sed 's/^[^-]*-//'); [ ! -e "$hash" ] && ln -s "$dir" "$hash" 2>/dev/null; done; fi
